events.message: I am filing a claim after my car was involved in a collision last night that caused significant damage.
The claim has been categorized under Auto Accident based on the initial report and damage description.
An agent has been assigned to handle your case and will be reaching out shortly to assist with next steps.
We have acknowledged receipt of your claim and started processing it to ensure timely resolution.
Please provide photos of the vehicle damage, police report, and a copy of your driverâ€™s license to proceed.
All requested documents including photos and official reports have been submitted for review by your agent.
The investigation team has commenced a detailed review of all submitted materials and evidence.
Investigation concluded, confirming liability and quantifying damages to your vehicle, ready for settlement.
A settlement offer has been proposed based on assessed damages and policy coverage limits.
The customer expressed dissatisfaction with the proposed settlement amount, requesting reconsideration.
Due to the feedback, the claim has been escalated to a senior adjuster for further evaluation.
The claim has been approved with an updated settlement amount considering the escalation review.
Payment has been issued directly to your bank account as per the approved settlement agreement.
Your claim has been officially closed. Thank you for your patience and cooperation throughout the process.
All records and documentation related to your claim have been archived for future reference if needed.
